definition: Shen Guofang (1952-), PRC assistant minister of foreign affairs (2003-2005)
to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)

sentences.english: Shen stressed that the peoples of China and Iraq have traditional friendship.
sentences.chinese: 沈国放强调，中伊两国人民有着传统的友好关系。

sentences.english: Shen briefed the press delegation on the development of the relations between China and Central Asian countries.
sentences.chinese: 沈国放向新闻团介绍了中国与中亚国家关系发展情况。
